name: Ghost Tower (demo/one level)
description:
A game about dealing with ghosts. Partially a shooty game, partially a puzzle game. Your main way of interacting (and attacking) is sending sms projectile with your phone (don't worry, it makes sense plot-wise... I think X) ).

The game doesn't have sounds yet, I'll add those later. It's still in development. 

Controls (keyboard):

Arrows - move
X - jump
A - shoot
Z - interact
C - pause

Gamepad:

A - jump
X - shoot
B - interact
Y - pause
